Posts.EditableText:
I haven't used Quest for a bit. 

Is there a way of embedding or playing a sound that is hosted on Bandcamp? I am interested in co-releasing a glitchy electronica EP and a simple cyberpunk text adventure. Otherwise what is the absolute simplest way to embed a sound that isn't included in the overall file size.
